title: The Night the Prowler
creator_credit: Chariot Films, New South Wales Film Corporation, Anthony Buckley and Jim Sharman
brief_description: This story begins as a comedy surrounding the reactions of the Bannisters to an alleged attack on their daughter, Felicity. From this point on, Felicity embarks on an odyssey of self-discovery. Adapted by Nobel prize-winning author, Patrick White, from his own short story. Stars John Derum, Maggie Kirkpatrick and Terry Camilleri.
